name: Steampunk Asset Pack
description:
An steampunk styled asset pack. Demonstrated with a virtual 3D space styled after the living space of an eccentric Hugo Steme. The environment is fully traversable and filled with intractable props.

The team

Farzin

-Created the steampunk mono bike

-Created the steampunk jet-pack

Created the Steampunk mask

-Created and Dressed the area with a desk, papers on the walls and chairs

-Created the particle effects

-Created the paper decals

-Managed the UE4 file and assembled the pieces

-Final lighting of the scene

Matt 

-Designed the shape of the environment

-Created the walls, floors, stairs columns and platforms

-Created the Dome roof

-Added Spline pipe meshes

-Created the wear decals

Tom

-Created and animated the armillary sphere

-Created the steampunk jacket and stand

-Created the gun-saber

-Created several set dressing props (clock, ottoman, boxes)

Mini

-Created the Display Cabinets

-Created the futuristic gun

-Initial lighting draft
